Wellcome41.Transcription:
Accipe that longeth to theRedde to god that his shuld beffuge
                    synne or it fle theThanne hevyn blysse þi mede shalbe

             Catalogue of Western Manuscripts on Medicine and Science. Vol. 1
                Manuscripts Written before 1650 A.D.
